00029 FXDEFMAP(RainbruRPG::Gui::LanguageSelector) LanguageSelectorMap[]={
00030   //____Message_Type_____________ID_______________Message_Handler_______
00031   FXMAPFUNC(SEL_COMMAND, RainbruRPG::Gui::LanguageSelector::ID_BUTTON, 
00032             RainbruRPG::Gui::LanguageSelector::onNotImplemented),
00033 
00034   FXMAPFUNC(SEL_COMMAND, RainbruRPG::Gui::LanguageSelector::ID_CHANGE_SNAP, 
00035             RainbruRPG::Gui::LanguageSelector::onChangeLanguage),
00036 
00037   FXMAPFUNC(SEL_COMMAND, RainbruRPG::Gui::LanguageSelector::ID_BTN_CANCEL, 
00038             RainbruRPG::Gui::LanguageSelector::onCancelClicked),
00039 
00040   FXMAPFUNC(SEL_COMMAND, RainbruRPG::Gui::LanguageSelector::ID_BTN_OK, 
00041             RainbruRPG::Gui::LanguageSelector::onOkClicked),
00042 
00043 };
00044 
00045 FXIMPLEMENT(RainbruRPG::Gui::LanguageSelector,FXDialogBox,
00046             LanguageSelectorMap,ARRAYNUMBER(LanguageSelectorMap));

00048 
00054 RainbruRPG::Gui::LanguageSelector::LanguageSelector(FXApp * a)
00055   :FXDialogBox(a,"Language selection"){ 
00056 
00057   // A common width for the Cancel and Ok buttons
00058   FXint buttonWidth=103;
00059 
00060   // frame construction
00061   FXVerticalFrame *root = new FXVerticalFrame(this, LAYOUT_FILL_Y|
00062                                               LAYOUT_FIX_HEIGHT);
00063   root->setHeight(60);
00064 
00065   // The language combo box
00066   FXComboBox* cbLang=new FXComboBox( root, 24, this, ID_CHANGE_SNAP, 
00067                             COMBOBOX_STATIC||LAYOUT_FIX_WIDTH|LAYOUT_RIGHT,
00068                                      0, 0, 160 );
00069   feedComboBox(cbLang);
00070 
00071   // The button frame
00072   FXHorizontalFrame *frame = new FXHorizontalFrame(root, LAYOUT_FILL_X|LAYOUT_FILL_Y);
00073   frame->setPadLeft(0);
00074   frame->setPadRight(0);
00075 
00076   FXButton* btnCancel=new FXButton(frame, "Cancel", NULL, this, 
00077                           ID_BTN_CANCEL, BUTTON_NORMAL|LAYOUT_FIX_WIDTH);
00078   btnCancel->setWidth(buttonWidth);
00079 
00080   FXButton* btnOk=new FXButton(frame, "Ok", NULL, this, 
00081                           ID_BTN_OK, BUTTON_NORMAL|LAYOUT_FIX_WIDTH);
00082   btnOk->setWidth(buttonWidth);
00083 
00084 }

00097 void RainbruRPG::Gui::LanguageSelector::create(){
00098   FXDialogBox::create();
00099   show(PLACEMENT_SCREEN);
00100 }

00132 long RainbruRPG::Gui::LanguageSelector::onChangeLanguage(FXObject *o,
00133                                                          FXSelector s,
00134                                                          void* v)
00135 {
00136   LOGI("The language combo box changed");

00146 void RainbruRPG::Gui::LanguageSelector::feedComboBox(FXComboBox* cb){
00147   xmlLanguage l;
00148   tLanguageList* ll=l.getLanguageList();
00149 
00150   // An empty item
00151   cb->appendItem("", NULL);
00152 
00153 
00154   // Create constant iterator for list.
00155   tLanguageList::const_iterator iter;
00156   // Iterate through list and output each element.
00157   for (iter=ll->begin(); iter != ll->end(); iter++){
00158     LOGCATS("Item : ");
00159     LOGCATS((*iter)->getComboText());
00160     LOGCAT();
00161     FXint sel=cb->appendItem((*iter)->getComboText(), (*iter));
00162 
00163     // Select the newly created item if it is the current one (LastUsed)
00164     if ((*iter)->isCurrent()){
00165       cb->setCurrentItem(sel);
00166     }
00167   }
00168 
00169   // Setting the droplist size
00170   if (ll->size()>10){
00171     cb->setNumVisible(10);
00172   }
00173   else{
00174     cb->setNumVisible(ll->size());
00175   }
00176 }

00189 long RainbruRPG::Gui::LanguageSelector::
00190 onCancelClicked(FXObject *o,FXSelector s,void* v){
00191   LOGI("Cancel button clicked");
00192   handle(this,FXSEL(SEL_COMMAND,ID_CANCEL),NULL);
00193 }

00206 long RainbruRPG::Gui::LanguageSelector::
00207 onOkClicked(FXObject *o,FXSelector s,void* v){
00208   LOGI("OK button clicked");
00209   handle(this,FXSEL(SEL_COMMAND,ID_ACCEPT),NULL);
00210 }
